General.Name: Danavation Technologies Corp
General.Description: Danavation Technologies Corp., an Internet of Things technology company, provides micro e-paper displays in North America. The company's Digital Smart Labels enable companies across various sectors to automate labelling, price, product, and promotions in real-time. It also offers its solution to retailers, such as big box and boutique grocers, as well as healthcare providers, manufacturing, and logistics companies. The company is headquartered in Woodbridge, Canada.
General.Address: 21 Roybridge Gate, Woodbridge, ON, Canada, L4H 1E6
